name: Darkness Lullabies
description:
Collection Name: Peace Trees Fall
Year of publication: 2008

Album description:
"Human tendency to violence" has been a mental concern for me for many years. Despite the weak human body, compared to other living beings, man has conquered the planet, but has not yet calmed down and has always been at war with his species throughout history.
The theme of this album is about the process of production and violent acts, which is narrated in seven pieces of music. Later in 2015, a song on the occasion of the death of Alan Kurdi as a complement to the album; I composed and added to this album.

Description of this song:
Many times, when we do not have the ability to accept a big and shocking truth, we will sleep ourselves and try to not see the truth. It's time that darkness includes us and calls for us lullaby. Lullaby with which you really fall into sleep


Description of sales method:
Tip 1: Anyone who buys two copies of this collection can also have a digital version of the purchased songs. Just send a direct message to my Twitter.
Tip 2: Anyone who buys three copies of this collection will receive all the album files as a gift and one copy of the eighth song that no one can buy directly through the wallet.
Tip 3: If someone buys two copies of a song and still has a copy of that song, that copy; In favor of the fuel buyer.

Finally, I would like to thank Hossein Yekta Pour for designing the poster for this collection.
